# Reading Notes


:::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}

- Scan and upload copies of **handwritten** reading notes
- Notes from tablet devices are acceptable
- Upload work though Canvas
- Documents must be PDFs
- Minimum one page long and must have your name on it

- Your lowest test grade is dropped

|Final Exam | Cumulative | June 23 |
